title: Fundamentals of 3D Content Representation and Rendering in 6G Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet and smartphone usage skills, along with general understanding of digital content
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones as learning tools, requiring explanations focused on real-life application cases rather than complex technical terminology.

learning_goals: The impact of 3D content technology on daily life and society in 6G networks can be explained.
The fundamental principles of NeRF and 3D-GS can be understood, and simple visualization cases can be analyzed.
Technical challenges and solutions for 3D content transmission in wireless networks can be discussed.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
